All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Ball
This class is the Ball model which contains all the data and behaviour of Ball.
BallFactory
A class make different kinds of ball and return it to the caller method.
Brick
An abstract model class that contains the data and behaviour of all bricks in the game.
BrickBreaker
The main javafx application class to run.
BrickFactory
A class that create different types of bricks according to the parameters received.
CementBrick
A concrete Cement Brick class that inherits the methods and behaviours from the abstract Brick class.
ClayBrick
A concrete Clay Brick class that inherits the methods and behaviours from the abstract Brick class.
Crack
A class that defines the appearance and behaviour of crackable brick.
DebugConsoleController
A controller class that is responsible for handling any user interaction/input with the debug console view.
DebugConsoleModel
A model that contains data for the debug console.
EndingScreenController
A controller class that handles the user input in the game ending screen.
GameBoardController
A class that handles the game board user input and call the suitable methods to update both the game board model and view.
GameBoardModel
A model that contains data for the gameBoard view and controller.
GameBoardView
The view class for gameBoard that displays data in the user interface.
GameLevels
A class that handles all the levels making in the game.
GameLogic
A class which contains all the entities logics and interactions in the game.
HomeMenuController
A controller class that is responsible for handling any user interaction/input with the home menu view.
InfoController
A controller class that is responsible for handling any user interaction/input with the info view.
MetalBrick
A concrete Metal Brick class that inherits the methods and behaviours from the abstract Brick class.
Mobile
An interface that has two moving methods.
MvcManager
A class that manage most of the model, controller and view (FXML) instantiation.
PauseMenuController
A controller class that is responsible for handling any user interaction/input with the pause menu view.
PauseMenuModel
A model class that contains data for the pause menu.
Player
A model class that defines the player data and behaviour.
RubberBall
A concrete Rubber ball class that inherits the methods and behaviours from the abstract Ball class.
ScoreboardController
A controller class that is responsible for handling any user interaction/input with the scoreboard view.
SteelBrick
A concrete Steel Brick class that inherits the methods and behaviours from the abstract Brick class.
TextAnimator
A class to run the text animation.
TextOutput
An interface for the text output.
UserInputController
A controller class that is responsible for handling any user interaction/input with the user input view.
